ParentListener Class

Defined in: app/mixins/parent-listener.js:1

A mixin which works as an abstract class to be used in every listener of the ChildBroadcaster

Inherited properties:

  • broadcasters

Inherited methods:

  • processAction: Any action or event of the child will end in this method. An example of a proper override of the method is in processAction:

             processAction: function (action, params){
             var me = this._listenerContext || this;

             me._super(action, params);

             switch(action) {
               case 'new_error':
                   me.addError(params.input, params.message);
                   break;
               case 'error_corrected':
                   me.removeError(params.input);
                   break;
               default:
             }

           },
  • Index
  • Methods
  • Properties

(

)
public

Defined in app/mixins/parent-listener.js:99

Used by the ChildBroadcaster to subscribe itself as a broadcaster.

    The ChildBroadcaster/broadcasterElement:property of the ChildBroadcaster

initializeListener

() private

Defined in app/mixins/parent-listener.js:89

Initialization of component. Listen to 'init' event

processAction

(
  • action
  • params
)
public

Defined in app/mixins/parent-listener.js:113

Used by the ChildBroadcaster in notifyAction. Any action or event of the child will end in this method. This should be properly override to handle the child actions

Parameters:

  • action String

    The name of the action triggered by the ChildBroadcaster

  • params Mixed

    The paremters needed to handle this action

removeBroadcaster

(
  • broadcasterElement
)
public

Defined in app/mixins/parent-listener.js:126

Used by the ChildBroadcaster to unsubscribe itself as a broadcaster.

Parameters:

  • broadcasterElement Object

    The ChildBroadcaster/broadcasterElement:property of the ChildBroadcaster

Properties

broadcasters

Array

Defined in app/mixins/parent-listener.js:67

An array of ChildBroadcaster/broadcasters:property with the subscribed ChildBroadcaster instances

Default: []

isParentListener

Boolena private

Defined in app/mixins/parent-listener.js:77

Property read by every ChildBroadcaster in order to know if this parent is a listener or not

Default: true

listener

Object

Defined in app/mixins/parent-listener.js:39

An read only abstraction of this class only with the methods we would like to provide to our ChildBroadcaster
